Entity.

The enum Type.

Main.java - used to initiate the program.

Message Of The Day.

The enum Item generation.

The enum Theme.

Poison weapon class.

Controller used to handle interaction with profile.fxml

This class represents the rat.
Rat.Direction
The enum Direction - describes rats movement direction.
Rat.Gender
The enum Gender - describes rats sex.
RatSprites
The type Rat sprites.
Resources
Resource.java - used to get resources throughout the program.
Score
Score - used to add to scoreboard
Scoreboard
Scoreboard - used to show top 10 players
ScoreboardController
ScoreboardController - used to manage fxml elements in scoreboard scene.
ScoreboardPlayer
ScoreboardPlayer - used to store and display player info
SettingsController
Settings Controller - handles all interaction in settings.fxml.
StageFunctions
StageFunctions.java, host of all functions across all fxml.
StageResizer
ResizeHelper.java, Can resize window and also drag window by the top bar.
StageResizer.ResizeListener
Resize listener added to nodes, allows for resize and drag.
StartProgram
StartProgram - eliminates errors relating to "Extends Application" in main class.
Sterilisation
Sterilisation weapon class.
Tile
The class responsible for the attributes of a Tile.

The enum Type.
